name: Tavern Crawl
description:
Tavern Crawl is a student-made, 3rd-person adventure starring Fish, a young countryside mouse who dreams of adventure. His kingdom uses alcohol collected from the city they live below as currency, fuel for fires, and resources to craft delicious and useful cocktails. When the alcohol mysteriously dries up, Fish volunteers to leave his home and investigate where the precious resource has gone.

Fast Paced Combat
Use your needle sword and bottlecap shield to fight those that would keep you from your destiny.

Crafting Cocktails
Use the alcohol collected from fallen enemies to craft cocktails with all sorts of useful effects.

Explore the Sewers
Explore the rich world of the sewers, filled with a host of characters and secrets for you to discover.

We'd Love Your Feedback
You can help us improve Tavern Crawl by filling out the feedback form, and letting us know how we can improve. Please be part of this game's development!
